name: Something Fowl Afoot
description:
Something Fowl Afoot is a classic point 'n' click adventure set in a non-pirate themed; Monkey-free; Caribbean island location.

Guybrush who? Never heard of him! Join us for a twisting tale of intrigue, amnesia and a rusted up zipper.

What would you do, waking up on a strange desert Island in a chicken costume? It's time to find out, in the first part of the epic point n click adventure, Something Fowl Afoot.
